::Whistler::
    "Hello.  I'm Whistler.  I can't stand fighting, I'm not built for it.  
May I ask who you folks are?  And don't take me too seriously I'm just 
getting sick of waiting.  I'm a bit new here as I was invited in and everyone 
left.  Do I sound bitter?  I don't even have a place to sit much less sleep.  
Standing now is the only way I can stay awake.  I'm babbling aren't I?  I 
guess I should stop talking now."
